front.title: PQC migration use cases for the telecom network

abstract.t: Telecommunications (Telecom) networks are important infrastructure. 3rd Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) provides security specifications for telecom networks, including network devices and user terminals. Meanwhile, the security protocols from IETF widely used in telecom systems. This docuemnt presents some post-quantum risks and assessments that exist in current telecom network, analyzes possible post-quantum migration cases and potential strategy in typical telecom network, the strategy includes the suggestion of related IETF protocols and profiles.
